author: Adam K. Raymond
title: ‘I’d Rather Be Alive’: Why Some Georgia Business Owners Are Not Reopening - New York Magazine
description:
1. ‘I’d Rather Be Alive’: Why Some Georgia Business Owners Are Not Reopening  New York Magazine
  2. Using White House Guidelines, Georgia Plans To Reopen Some Businesses  NPR
  3. Georgia governor to reopen some businesses as early as Friday a…
content:
Gyms, bowling alleys, barbershops, and tattoo parlors will be allowed to open in Georgia on Friday, Governor Brian Kemp announced this week. Many wont.
With more than 20,000 confirmed cases and 818 deaths due to the coronavirus in Georgia, Kemp is pitching t… [+2561 chars]
